metadata.title: CVE-2022-31609 on Ubuntu 20.04 LTS (focal) - medium
metadata.description: NVIDIA vGPU software contains a vulnerability in the Virtual GPU Manager(vGPU plugin), where it allows the guest VM to allocate resources for whichthe guest is not authorized. This vulnerability may lead to loss of dataintegrity and confidentiality, denial of service, or informationdisclosure.
